languages.text: "О грядущем. Думал{mf||а} ли ты, что такое быть Астартес? Не знать иной семьи, кроме боевых братьев? Не ведать иного праздника, кроме радости убийства врагов и восславления погибших товарищей? Точно знать, что смерть твоя будет страшной, жестокой и мучительной — ведь время не властно над нами, и ни один воин Всеотца не испустил дух в своей постели".

"About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."
languages.original_text: "О грядущем. Думал{mf||а} ли ты, что такое быть Астартес? Не знать иной семьи, кроме боевых братьев? Не ведать иного праздника, кроме радости убийства врагов и восславления погибших товарищей? Точно знать, что смерть твоя будет страшной, жестокой и мучительной — ведь время не властно над нами, и ни один воин Всеотца не испустил дух в своей постели".

To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

"About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

languages.text: “我在考虑我的未来。你有没有想过，成为阿斯塔特修士意味着什么？除了战场上的兄弟之外，再无别的亲人？除了屠杀敌人与赞美战友的喜悦，再无别的盛宴？你会确切无疑地明白，你的死亡将会充满了恐怖、残酷与痛苦，因为时间不会对全父的战士产生任何影响。没有任何一位星际战士，可以在柔软的床上静静地咽下最后一口气。”
languages.original_text: "About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

traits.locale_text: “我在考虑我的未来。你有没有想过，成为阿斯塔特修士意味着什么？除了战场上的兄弟之外，再无别的亲人？除了屠杀敌人与赞美战友的喜悦，再无别的盛宴？你会确切无疑地明白，你的死亡将会充满了恐怖、残酷与痛苦，因为时间不会对全父的战士产生任何影响。没有任何一位星际战士，可以在柔软的床上静静地咽下最后一口气。”

languages.text: 「未来について考えていた。アスタルテスになるとはどういうことか、疑問に感じたことはないか？同胞以外に戦闘で味方するものはないと知るためか？敵を倒し、死んだ仲間を称える喜びに勝る宴はないと知るためか？死は悲惨で、残酷で、苦痛に満ちた物になると確信するためなのか…俺たちは時に縛られないがゆえに、全知の父の戦士が柔らかいベッドで息を引き取ることなどない」
languages.original_text: "About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

traits.locale_text: 「未来について考えていた。アスタルテスになるとはどういうことか、疑問に感じたことはないか？同胞以外に戦闘で味方するものはないと知るためか？敵を倒し、死んだ仲間を称える喜びに勝る宴はないと知るためか？死は悲惨で、残酷で、苦痛に満ちた物になると確信するためなのか…俺たちは時に縛られないがゆえに、全知の父の戦士が柔らかいベッドで息を引き取ることなどない」

languages.text: «Sobre el futuro. ¿Alguna vez se ha preguntado lo que significa ser un Astartes? ¿Tener por única familia a tus hermanos de armas? ¿Degustar como único banquete la alegría de matar a tus enemigos y elogiar a tus camaradas caídos? ¿Saber con certeza que tu muerte será terrible, brutal y agónica? El tiempo no pasa para nosotros y no hay ningún guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas que haya muerto en una cama cómoda».
languages.original_text: "About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

traits.locale_text: «Sobre el futuro. ¿Alguna vez se ha preguntado lo que significa ser un Astartes? ¿Tener por única familia a tus hermanos de armas? ¿Degustar como único banquete la alegría de matar a tus enemigos y elogiar a tus camaradas caídos? ¿Saber con certeza que tu muerte será terrible, brutal y agónica? El tiempo no pasa para nosotros y no hay ningún guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas que haya muerto en una cama cómoda».

languages.text: « Je pense à l'avenir. Vous êtes-vous jamais demandé ce que cela signifie d'être un Astartes ? De n'avoir nulle autre famille que vos frères d'armes ? De ne savourer nul autre plaisir que la joie d'abattre vos ennemis et de chanter les louanges de vos camarades tombés au combat ? De savoir avec certitude que votre mort sera terrible, brutale et douloureuse, car le temps n'a pas d'emprise sur vous et qu'aucun guerrier du Père de Tous n'a jamais rendu son dernier souffle dans un lit douillet ? »
languages.original_text: "About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense à l'avenir. Vous êtes-vous jamais demandé ce que cela signifie d'être un Astartes ? De n'avoir nulle autre famille que vos frères d'armes ? De ne savourer nul autre plaisir que la joie d'abattre vos ennemis et de chanter les louanges de vos camarades tombés au combat ? De savoir avec certitude que votre mort sera terrible, brutale et douloureuse, car le temps n'a pas d'emprise sur vous et qu'aucun guerrier du Père de Tous n'a jamais rendu son dernier souffle dans un lit douillet ? »

languages.text: "Über die Zukunft. Habt Ihr Euch je gefragt, was es bedeutet, ein Astartes zu sein? Keine andere Familie zu kennen als Eure Kampfbrüder? Kein anderes Fest zu kennen als die Freude, Eure Feinde zu erschlagen und Eure gefallenen Kameraden zu preisen? Mit Sicherheit zu wissen, dass Euer Tod furchtbar, brutal und schmerzhaft sein wird? Denn die Zeit hat keine Macht über uns, und kein Krieger des Allvaters hat seinen letzten Atemzug je in einem weichen Bett getan."
languages.original_text: "About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."

traits.locale_text: "Über die Zukunft. Habt Ihr Euch je gefragt, was es bedeutet, ein Astartes zu sein? Keine andere Familie zu kennen als Eure Kampfbrüder? Kein anderes Fest zu kennen als die Freude, Eure Feinde zu erschlagen und Eure gefallenen Kameraden zu preisen? Mit Sicherheit zu wissen, dass Euer Tod furchtbar, brutal und schmerzhaft sein wird? Denn die Zeit hat keine Macht über uns, und kein Krieger des Allvaters hat seinen letzten Atemzug je in einem weichen Bett getan."

languages.text: "Geleceği düşünüyordum. Astartes olmak ne demektir, hiç düşündün mü? Savaştaki kardeşlerin dışında bir aile tanımamak. Düşmanlarını katletmenin neşesi ve düşen yoldaşlarını yüceltmek için yapılan ziyafetlerden başka ziyafet nedir bilmemek. Ölümünün korkunç, acılı ve kahredici olacağını bilmek... Zira zaman, bizlere işlemez. Yücebaba'nın hiçbir savaşçısı son nefesini uykunun yumuşak kollarında vermemiştir."
languages.original_text: "About the future. Have you ever wondered what it means to be an Astartes? To know no other family but your brothers in battle? To know no other feast but the joy of slaying your enemies and extolling your fallen comrades? To know with certainty that your death will be terrible, brutal, and agonising — for time holds no sway over us, and no warrior of the Allfather has ever breathed his last in a soft bed."
